Literature.Title: Design and Synthesis of a Novel Cationic Peptide with Potent and Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Activity.
Literature.Author: Liu WP, Chen YH, Ming X, Kong Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>512µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=512µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>512µg/ml),Candida albicans(no activity data),Aspergillus niger(MIC=>512µg/ml)
